warningDesc:
This plugin must not be used as a tool to monitor others' behavior.
Any notifications/reports/logs/status records/screenshots/recordings/variable names and all data generated and used by this plugin are for personal convenience only and are not to be used as any legal basis/evidence.
Your device name and device identifier will be part of the URI, transmitted in plain text via webhook to the Bark server.
barkApiBaseLinkDesc:
The base link for Bark API, please obtain it after downloading the Bark app.
Example: https://api.day.app/AbCdEfGhIjKmLnOpQrStUv
displayNoticeWhenBarkNotiSent: Display Notification When Bark Notification Sent
displayNoticeWhenBarkNotiSentDesc: Enabled, a notification will pop up on this device after reporting the online behavior to the phone.
onlineLocalmachineNoticeText: Reported this login to the phone
barkOnlineNoticeContentHeader: SiYuan has just been started on this device:
onlyEnableListedDevicesDesc: When the switch is on, the plugin function is enabled only on the listed devices. When the switch is off, the plugin function is enabled on all devices.
enableDeviceListDesc: The listed devices will have the plugin function enabled when the switch is on. Please avoid manual editing of this list.
addCurrentDeviceIntoListDesc: Add the current device to the list
removeCurrentDeviceFromListDesc: Remove the current device from the list
hintDesc:
• ● Created by zxkmm, MIT licensed open source.
  • ● If you like this plugin, please give my GitHub repository a free star ⭐ (Star).
  • ● Link: siyuan_online_devices_mgr
